title: CFTC Chair calls for comprehensive regulation for digital assets following ETF approvals
description:
In a detailed speech delivered in Naples on Jan. 26, CFTC Chair Rostin Behnam said regulators need to ramp up their efforts to supervise the budding cryptocurrency industry following the approval of Bitcoin ETFs, which does not imply the sector is regulated. Benham expressed significant concerns regarding the current state of cryptocurrency and digital asset […]

title: Bitcoin’s Hashrate Rebounds From January Dip as Miners Eye Upcoming Difficulty Adjustment
description: Bitcoin’s cumulative hashrate witnessed notable swings starting in late December, with a pronounced decline occurring in mid-January. This decrease was primarily attributed to the severe cold in Texas, leading many miners to pause their operations temporarily. By Jan. 21, 2024, the hashrate’s seven-day simple moving average (SMA) dipped under the 500 exahash per second (EH/s) […]

title: Opera set to launch its AI-powered iOS browser in Europe
description: Opera, the renowned browser developer based in Norway, has unveiled plans to launch a cutting-edge AI-powered browser tailored for iOS users in Europe. This strategic move comes in the wake of Apple’s commitment to allow alternative browser engines on iOS, aligning with the stipulations of the European Digital Markets Act (DMA). The DMA mandates a […]

title: CFTC Chair questions crypto’s regulatory status amid ETF approval
description: The recent approval of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the United States has sparked concerns about potential misunderstandings regarding regulatory oversight for cryptocurrencies. Rostin Behnam, the Chair of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), expressed these apprehensions during a keynote speech on January 26. CFTC chairman waded into crypto regulatory issues The approval of […]

title: Binance.US hit with regulatory setbacks in Florida and Alaska
description: The regulatory hurdles in Alaska and Florida are part of a broader crackdown on Binance.US. The leadership changes and criminal charges against former CEO Changpeng Zhao haven't helped.
